settings.heading: NIT Championship
settings.description: The third annual college tennis tournament was held May 7-9, 2025 in Rome, Ga. with men's and women's teams competing for postseason national trophies. Washington State won the women's crown and Chattanooga captured the men's. See below for teams, draws, and results.

settings.heading: how to watch
settings.description: Friday's 10 a.m. finals will see Chattanooga vs. Saint Mary's for the men's title, and UNC Charlotte vs. Washington State for the women's trophy.

settings.heading: Watch the Live Stream
settings.paragrap-title: Catch all of the NIT Championship action on PlaySight by creating a free account to access the streams.

settings.heading: NIT 2025 results
settings.list: Day 3: Women's Final: Washington State def. UNC Charlotte, 4-0. Men's Final: Chattanooga def. Saint Mary's, 4-2
settings.list2: Day 2: Women's Semifinals: Washington State def. North Texas, 4-0; UNC Charlotte def. North Alabama, 4-0. Men's Semifinals: Chattanooga def. NCCU, 4-3; Saint Mary's def. Rider, 4-1
settings.list3: Day 1 Women's Quarterfinals: North Texas def. Appalachian State, 4-1;  UNC Charlotte def. St. Mary's, 4-1; Washington State def. Northern Illinois, 4-0 and North Alabama  def. Middle Tennessee, 4-2
settings.list4: Day 1 Men's Quarterfinals: North Texas def. Appalachian State, 4-1; Rider def. UNC Asheville, 4-1; North Carolina Central def. New Mexico State, 4-3

settings.heading: 2025 Women's Draw
settings.description: In the women's final on Friday, Washington State defeated UNC Charlotte, 4-0.

settings.heading: 2025 Men's Draw
settings.description: After three days of action in Georgia, Chattanooga defeated Saint Mary's for the title on Friday.

settings.heading: 2024 MEN'S BRACKET
settings.list: The 2024 NIT Championship final  featured Tulsa vs. Pacific on Wednesday morning at 9 a.m. EST
settings.list2: Tulsa won the doubles point and No. 2 singles Callum Gale clinched the trophy.
settings.list3: Tulsa was the top seed, as rated by UTR Power 6 rankings.
settings.list4: All matches were streamed live on Prime Video — free for Amazon Prime members.

settings.heading: 2024 WOMEN'S BRACKET
settings.list: The women's final saw Tulsa upset a top-seeded Colorado squad, 4-2.
settings.list2: The women's semifinals featured Colorado vs. Liberty and Tulsa vs. West Virginia.
settings.list3: Colorado was a semifinalist in 2023, while Tulsa was making it's NIT debut.
settings.list4: All matches were streamed live on Prime Video — free for Amazon Prime members.

settings.heading: What is the NIT Championship?
settings.row_content: The NIT Championship is the National Invitational Tennis Championship. (Not to be confused with college basketball’s NIT Tournament). The exclusive postseason tournament welcomes eight of the top men's and women's college tennis teams from across the country to compete for the NIT Championship titles. The tournament allows men’s and women’s teams to gain valuable postseason experience. The teams are selected to participate by the NIT Championship tournament committee, with the new UTR Sports College Team Rankings among the top criteria for consideration.

settings.heading: How did the NIT Championship start?
settings.row_content:
The NIT Championship, a postseason tennis tournament, started in 2023. UTR Sports, then Universal Tennis, launched the tournament as part of its continued effort to support college tennis programs across the country. In the inaugural NIT Championship, the TCU Horned Frogs beat Stetson 4-0 to win the NIT Championship women’s title. 

“The NIT Championship was extremely well done, just so professional in every way, and made our girls feel special from the moment we walked in,” said TCU head coach Lee Taylor Walker. “We got to play another month of the season with a great team, and so this has been amazing.”

On the men’s side, the third-seeded Liberty Flames beat the Vanderbilt Commodores 4-1.

settings.heading: Which teams competed in the 2024 NIT Championship
settings.row_content: The men’s NIT Championship bracket featured Vanderbilt, University of Denver, Liberty University, UC Davis, Army West Point, UC San Diego, The Citadel, and Reinhardt University. In the women’s bracket, TCU, University of Colorado, Stetson University, Appalachian State University, the University of Wyoming, California Polytechnic State University, California State University, Northridge; and UC San Diego battled for the inaugural NIT Championship.

settings.heading: When and where will the 2025 NIT Championship take place?
settings.row_content: The 2025 edition will take place May 7-9 at the Rome Tennis Center In Rome, Georgia. This incredible year-end national championship will again elevate college tennis and support the growth of programs across the United States.

settings.heading: How to watch the NIT Championship?
settings.row_content: All NIT Championship matches will be aired on Amazon Prime Video, free for Prime members. The tournament is another step forward for UTR Sports as the company continues to elevate the college tennis experience and showcase the sport globally.

settings.heading: Why host the UTR Sports NIT Championship?
settings.row_content: UTR Sports and the UTR Sports Tennis Coaches Association are hosting the NIT Championship because they're committed to supporting the future of all college tennis programs in the U.S. As a leader in college tennis, UTR Sports has proven and established itself as the official technology and solution provider with the best and most proven rating and ranking, tournament and event technology, performance data, and analytics.

settings.heading: FAQs About the UTR Sports NIT Championship
Join UTR Sports in 3 easy steps
settings.paragrap-title: It’s easier than ever to enjoy more tennis and pickleball and connect with players near you on the UTR Sports app.

settings.description: The NIT Championship was extremely well done. Just so professional in every way and made our girls feel special from the moment we walked in.
settings.author: Lee Taylor Walker

settings.description: I want to thank UTR Sports for giving us the opportunity to play the NIT tournament. I think it’s a great way to finish up the season and it’s super fun to play more with your team.
settings.author: Antonia Balzert
settings.author-designation: Member of Colorado Buffaloes Women's Tennis Team

settings.description: I really thought tennis needed something like this for a long time. To be able to promote our sport with another national tournament at the end of the year and have post-season play is fantastic.
settings.author: Ashleigh Antal
settings.author-designation: Associate Head Coach Women's Tennis, Clemson University

settings.description: We really appreciate the extra opportunity and it's an amazing tournament. I really hope we can see it again next year.
settings.author: Josh Wilson
settings.author-designation: Member of the Liberty Flames team that won inaugural UTR Sports Men's NIT Championship

settings.description: Any time student-athletes are provided an opportunity for postseason play, it is something that they will cherish and will motivate them to work together for that common goal.
settings.author: Manuel Diaz
settings.author-designation: University of Georgia, Men’s Head Coach

settings.description: This is a game changer for collegiate tennis. The NIT Championship offers an opportunity for 16 programs to finish their season with a national championship on the line.
settings.author: Chase Hodges
settings.author-designation: VP of Universal Tennis and former 15-time NAIA National Championship Coach

settings.description: The NIT Championship was extremely well done. Just so professional in every way and made our girls feel special from the moment we walked in.
settings.author: Lee Taylor Walker

settings.description: We really appreciate the extra opportunity and it's an amazing tournament. I really hope we can see it again next year.
settings.author: Josh Wilson
settings.author-designation: Senior at Liberty, Winner of Inaugural Universal Tennis Men's NIT Championship

settings.author: Antonia Balzert
